name: Talk Notes: Advanced JSON Handling in Go
summary:
For more content like this, buy my in-progress eBook, Data Serialization in Go⁠, and get updates immediately as they are added! This post contains links and notes for the presentation I gave on March 5, 2020, for the Golang Rotterdam meetup group.
Download the slides in PDF format, or you can view the Go Present source file.
Previous blog posts on related topics:
“Slightly” custom marshaling JSON Arrays as Go structs
